string-array.name: shame_sentences
string-array.item: I have the attention span of a goldfish.
I am addicted to scrolling and I need help.
My dopamine receptors are fried.
I would rather scroll than build my future.
I am weak and I surrender to the algorithm.
This app is smarter than me.
I promise to touch grass after this.
I am wasting my potential one swipe at a time.
Brainrot is my favorite hobby.
I have no self control whatsoever.
I am letting a machine control my life.
I am voluntarily lowering my IQ right now.
I choose temporary pleasure over long term goals.
My ancestors are disappointed in me.
I am a slave to the notification badge.
Reality is too boring for me.
I need this digital pacifier to function.
I am procrastinating on my dreams.
Please unlock, I have zero discipline.
I admit that I am doomscrolling again.
